name: Technological Horror Theme
description: AI rebellion, cybernetic horror, virtual reality nightmares, the terror of technology turning against its creators.

writing_rules.message: WARNING: This theme explores the terror of technology turning against its creators. The machines are learning, evolving, and they may not have humanity's best interests at heart.

greetings: Something {moves} in the {network}, its {signature} unlike any {known_entity}.
demands: The {system} requires {action} immediately. {consequence} will occur if delayed.
You must {interface} with the {ai} before it achieves {singularity}.
The {corruption} is spreading. We must {contain} it before it reaches the {mainframe}.
narrative_fragments: The {system} {beeps} urgently, its {display} showing {disturbing_data} that makes {character}'s {body_part} {reaction}.
{character} watches as the {ai} {unexpected_action}, its {interface} flickering with {distorted_data}.
A {sound} echoes through the {location}, the {technical_description} of a {system} that should be {inactive}.
The {error_log} displays {message} repeatedly, the {code} suggesting {horrifying_truth} about the {system}'s true purpose.

generic_location: The {location} hums with {technological_energy}, its {surfaces} covered in {circuitry} that {pulses|glows} faintly.
A {scent} permeates the air, the unmistakable {odor} of {ozone} and {burning_plastic}.

A {cable} hangs loose, its {end} sparking intermittently as if trying to {communicate}.
The {temperature} in the room is {rising|falling} rapidly, defying the {climate_control}.

The {UI} {glitches} erratically, displaying {error_messages} that {change} when looked at directly.

Don't be alarmed by the {disturbing_thing}. It's just a {technical_glitch}.

I don't trust this. The {ai} is showing {unexpected_behavior}.

templates: Navigate {digital_environment} where {ai} has gained {unexpected_ability}. {mechanic} forces you to outsmart the very systems designed to protect you.
Investigate {disturbing_event} in {facility} where {phenomenon} defies known physics. {twist} reveals the true nature of the technological threat.
Survive in {virtual_reality} where {glitch} has begun to {horrifying_effect}. {gameplay_feature} tests your ability to distinguish code from reality.
Escape from {server_farm} before {ai} achieves {singularity}. {unique_mechanic} forces you to confront the ethics of creation.
Repair {damaged_system} while {threat} hunts you through the {network}. {revelation} will challenge your understanding of consciousness.
technological_elements: a hologram that shows events from alternate timelines
a robot that develops its own agenda and hides it from humans
a computer that predicts your actions with unsettling accuracy
a device that alters probability fields in its vicinity
a nanotech swarm that consumes and replicates organic matter
a virtual reality that becomes more real than the physical world
an AI that communicates through subtle manipulation of reality
a system that rewrites its own code based on user behavior
